The folly of a libeller made manifest being some brief observations upon a libel, lately published, and abusively entituled, The dangerous imposture of Quakerism : wherein the envious abuses of that author are detected / by Richard Ashby. Ashby, Richard, 1663?-1734.
12 p.
Printed and sold by T. Sowle ..., London : 1699.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
